Title: Relates to municipal funding for the training of firefighters
Summary: Authorizes municipalities to fund training of firefighters; allows a municipality to recoup the cost of sending a firefighter to training school from another municipality that hires that firefighter within three years of their training.
LawCode: Amd ยง72-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the appropriation of funds for the training of firefighters
